bike.description: A6-SL custom-butted alloy w/ aero-shaped down tube, hydroformed top tube, integrated head tube
sizes: XS/S (49cm), S (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (61cm)

components.description: A6-SL alloy aero seatstays w/ ride tuned chainstays, forged Track dropout w/ replaceable stainless axle interface
FC-770 Fuji straight blade integrated carbon w/ 1 1/8" alloy steerer
Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick, 150 tpi, 700c x 23mm
FSA Orbit CE 1 1/8" integrated w/ alloy top cover
Oval R500 w/ CrMo hollow rails
